title: Increased Nature-Related Impact Reporting, TNFD to Address Measurement Challenges
description: A report by Sustainable Fitch shows despite an increased prevalence of disclosures, difficulties remain in measuring biodiversity and nature-related impacts, and creating mandatory reporting rules appears unlikely.
content: A recent report by Sustainable Fitch on biodiversity in ESG reveals an increased prevalence of nature-related disclosures, especially with the recent creation of the Taskforce for Nature-related Fina… [+2946 chars]
